title: New: Oyinda – Flatline
body:
Have long made my admiration for **Oyinda’s** music pretty clear; her debut EP was a mix of smooth, intoxicating pop numbers, whilst the material released so far this year sees her pushing the boat out a little more.

_Flatline_, her latest single, is a sleek, expertly produced gem, landing somewhere between the sultry pop of George Maple, and the dancefloor ready AlunaGeorge. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
